item.description:
In lieu of our regularly scheduled April meetup, I thought it would be best to focus attention on this upcoming Tax Day rally. There are plenty of places we can choose to go afterward for food and drink.

Facebook link:
https://www.facebook.com/events/116256208560472/

The event will include live music and speakers covering a variety of topics relating to limited government and individual liberty in Massachusetts and nationwide.

MC - Tom Duggan, Publisher, Valley Patriot newspaper, Radio talk host
Keynote Speaker -- Grover Norquist – President, Americans for Tax Reform
Dr. Keith Ablow -- Author, FOX NEWS expert on psychiatry
Ron Shaich - Cofounder, No Labels, CEO/Founder Panera Bread
Special appearance by hip hop artist Andres "DraMatik" Gonzales
Jeff Kuhner - Radio talk host, WRKO
Jeff Katz – Coach, Columnist, Broadcaster
Jim Wallace - Executive Director, Gun Owners' Action League (GOAL)
Jessica Vaughan - Director of Policy Studies, Center for Immigration Studies
Nathan Fatal - President, New England Objectivist Society
Aaron Goldstein - Writer, American Spectator
Paul Craney – Executive Director, Massachusetts Fiscal Alliance
Todd Feinburg – Radio talk host
Andrea Taber – President/Founder, Ever So Humble Pie Company" AKA "Whoopie Pie Lady"
Jake Danishevsky – Soviet-born Jewish American, Author, of "AfterTastes and Tales from Russia"
Live music by People's Blowback
item.name: Tax Day Tea Party Rally
